entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Light snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 34 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
